verbs: What is it you truly desire? ...don't answer that
Hello, Detective... it's bad news again
I am a Devil of my word... unfortunately
Oh, my me! ...this is a disaster
For Dad's sake! ...why is this happening
A deal's a deal... even the bad ones
I'm like walking heroin... and that's not a compliment
Trust me, I've been doing this a long time... it never gets easier
I know evil... I'm looking at this codebase
People don't have power over us... deadlines do
What I hate more than anything is... this
Everyone deserves a second chance... rarely a third
Desire is truth... and truth hurts
Heaven isn't a democracy... neither is debugging
I punish those who deserve it... including myself
I love L.A. ...said no one stuck in traffic
You're far too interesting to let die... but it's tempting
The Devil always keeps his promises... regrettably
Welcome to Lux... abandon hope
I'm the Devil. I don't lie... I just suffer
Not today, Father... not ever, ideally
Amenadiel, always a pleasure... it's not
Maze, with me... into the abyss
Detective, we have a case... another one (sigh)
I've got a favor to call in... they won't like it
